title: SANDWORM DEATH
desc: You have been killed by a <font=text_4m>sandworm</>. All items in your inventory have been lost and are not recoverable.
Stick to rocky ground to avoid the sandworm's attention or use a vehicle to travel quickly across the open sands.

title: SANDWORM THREAT
desc: This bar in the center of the screen shows the <font=text_4m>vibrations</> you are making on open sand -- vibrations will attract the <font=text_4m>Sandworms</>. When the vibration bar <font=text_4m>turns red</>, seek safety immediately--the sandworm is nearby.
The closer a worm is, the more sensitive it is to vibrations. Take the utmost care crossing the open desert!

title: DEATH
desc: Arrakis is an unforgiving world, and <font=text_4m>death</> here is costly. Items in your backpack can be recovered from your death location.
You will lose everything if you are killed by a <font=text_4m>Sandworm</> or <font=text_4m>Coriolis Storm</>.

title: FINDING WATER
desc: You can partially replenish your hydration level by drinking <font=text_4m>Dew</> from <font=text_4m>Dew Flowers</>.

title: WATER DISCIPLINE
desc: Having your <font=text_4m>Hydration Level</> above one-third will give you a bonus to your maximum stamina, which is further increased above two-thirds.

When your hydration is below one-third, the bonus to your maximum stamina is removed -- when it is empty, you become <font=text_4m>Dehydrated</> and you will start to lose health until you hydrate again.

title: DRINKING BLOOD
desc: Blood can be consumed to hydrate yourself.
